Articles.Description: "Rarely we see genuine love in movie industry... they look divine together," wrote Queen actor Kangana Ranaut.
Articles.Content: Kangana Ranaut on her Instagram Story has seemingly confirmed Sidharth Malhotra and Kiara Advani's wedding. Sharing a video of the couple from their Shershaah promotions, Kangana wrote, "How delightf… [+488 chars]

Articles.Title: Actor Connie Britton on new Apple TV+ drama series "Dear Edward"
Articles.Description: Connie Britton joins "CBS Mornings" to discuss her new series, "Dear Edward." The show is about a 12-year-old boy who becomes the lone survivor of a plane crash. Britton stars as Dee Dee Cameron, a wealthy and privileged woman who loses her husband in the cra…
